short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distract yourself by popping the lock

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distract yourself playing popper when you open a new tab. Fun clicking game. The line will be moving along the lock you have to tap when the line is close to a ball if you miss it game will be over.
